title: Trace dynamics and its implications for my work of the last two decades
abstract: I review the basic ideas of "trace dynamics", as formulated in my 2004 Cambridge University Press book "Quantum Theory as an Emergent Phenomenon", and then discuss how they have influenced much of my work of the last two decades.
journal_ref: International Journal of Modern Physics A 39 (No. 36) 2447003 (2024)
comment: 11 pages, Essay for inclusion in the Lars Brink Memorial Volume to be published by World Scientific
